full_summary:
=====================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title and Identification

* **Notices**: D1124-240002 SAS SUPPORT AND MAINTENANCE RENEWAL
* **Reference Number**: WS4688018336-Doc4691796585
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4688018336

### Tender Details

* **Amendment Notice**: This announcement is valid as issued on 2024-07-24 and supersedes previous versions
* **Tender Closing Date**: The closing time for receipt of all bids is July 25, 2024 at 2:00 pm EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: The expected contract start date is September 1, 2024

### Tender Requirements

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price

### Trade Agreements

* **Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entities**: Public Service Commission (PSC), 22 Eddy Street, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0M7, Canada

### Contacts

* **Name**: Stephane Devost (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [stephane.devost@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.devost@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not Available

### Note

Please ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submission is made by July 25, 2024 at 2:00 pm EST. Late submissions will be declared nonresponsive.
